name: Employee Time management application - TimeTrackerX
desc: This is a employee management application which is used for trackking employee data, their work schedules, projects are they working, the meeting they are doing, etc.

name: Ecommerce Website - StepUp-Field
desc: This website is a fully functional shoeselling website with all features and a full admin side. Users can buy their favorite shoe according to their choices and get it delivered.

name: AI Interview preparation platform
desc: This website is a tech interview questions preparation platform which gives questions related to your choosen topic and gives feedback for your answer with help of OpenAI api

name: doctor's appointment booking application - Heal Hub
desc: This is a online doctor booking application which is used for booking doctor's appointment with appropriete time slots according to their specialities and convenience, etc.

name: Pizza ordering website - Pizza Town
desc: This website is a clone of dominos.com which can be used to order fresh and tasty pizzas online.
